definitions.definition: ( India ) A 2- wheeled oxcart used for transporting freight .
( India , Sri Lanka ) A 2- wheeled ox - or horsecart used for transporting people .

main_definition: ( India ) A 2- wheeled oxcart used for transporting freight .
secondary_definitions: ( India , Sri Lanka ) A 2- wheeled ox - or horsecart used for transporting people .

definitions.definition: Advocacy of a position when motivated by political allegiance , public relations interests, or for other reasons considered crass compared to personal conviction .
The use of hacks ( ingenious but inelegant techniques ).

main_definition: ( slang , chiefly derogatory ) Advocacy of a position when motivated by political allegiance , public relations interests, or for other reasons considered crass compared to personal conviction .
secondary_definitions: ( slang , computing ) The use of hacks ( ingenious but inelegant techniques ).
